com.magnet.attributes.api

Interface AttributeSchema


  • public interface AttributeSchema
    Defines the schema that governs an AttributeContainer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<AttributeType<?>> getAttributes() 
      String getCollection()
      For an AttributeSchema that describes an Entity this is the service that is used to manage this Entity types.
      String getDescription()
      Get a description of the Entity to which this schema refers.
      String getEntityClass()
      Most AttributeContainer instances are specified by annotating a java interface.
      Map<String,AttributeType<?>> getRankedSchemaMap()
      Returns a map from attribute name to it's schema definition, with the entries ranked.
      Map<String,AttributeType<?>> getSchemaMap()
      Returns a map from attribute name to it's schema definition, with the entries unranked.
      String getType()
      For an AttributeSchema this is a short name that is used to refer to the class of AttributeContainer instance that this schema is associated with.
      AttributeType<?> getTypeForAttributeName(String name)
      Lookup the type for the specific attribute key.
      boolean isDynamic()
      If true the schema may be extended to support additional attributes dynamically at runtime.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityClass

        String getEntityClass()
        Most AttributeContainer instances are specified by annotating a java interface. This method returns the String representation of the class name that was used to specify the associated AttributeContainer

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Get a description of the Entity to which this schema refers.

      • getCollection

        String getCollection()
        For an AttributeSchema that describes an Entity this is the service that is used to manage this Entity types. When using REST this is the relative URI under which Entities of this type are acquired. It is also the default name of the property through which this type is referenced when Entities or Nodes reference one another. It is generally the pluralized form of the getType()
        See Also:
        com.magnet.model.atttributes.annotations.EntityDefinition#service

      • getType

        String getType()
        For an AttributeSchema this is a short name that is used to refer to the class of AttributeContainer instance that this schema is associated with. It is a short hand equivalent of the value returned by getEntityClass() and is reflective of its equivalent object hierarchy.
        See Also:
        com.magnet.model.atttributes.annotations.EntityDefinition#type

      • isDynamic

        boolean isDynamic()
        If true the schema may be extended to support additional attributes dynamically at runtime. Most AttributeSchema instances are derived from and associated with a specific annotated java bean style interface. Some sources of Entity instances are based on external systems that support extensible collections of attributes. In such cases the set of base attributes are dynamically extended.
        Returns:
        true if entities governed by this schema may have attributes dynamically added.

      • getTypeForAttributeName

        AttributeType<?> getTypeForAttributeName(String name)
        Lookup the type for the specific attribute key. THis version includes the "scope". An attribute definition includes a "scope" that is used to prevent collisions amongst attributes where an instance of an Entity support multiple sub classes. In all cases the key is of the form "//". To acquire all types regardless of scope use the method getTypeForAttributeName(String).

      • getSchemaMap

        Map<String,AttributeType<?>> getSchemaMap()
        Returns a map from attribute name to it's schema definition, with the entries unranked.
        Returns:
        a map of attribute name to AttributeType

      • getRankedSchemaMap

        Map<String,AttributeType<?>> getRankedSchemaMap()
        Returns a map from attribute name to it's schema definition, with the entries ranked.
        Returns:
        a sorted of attribute name to AttributeType
        See Also:
        com.magnet.model.atttributes.annotations.AttributeDefinition#rank

      • getAttributes

        Collection<AttributeType<?>> getAttributes()
